name: Life of Dusty
description:
‎

Hello!

My name is Dusty and this is my story

‎

‎

‎

Controls

Move around using WASD Keys

and

Rotate using SPACE Key

‎

‎

‎

Credits

a mini-story game by Cem Kaan Uğur

made in 48 Hours for Kenney Jam theme Rotation

Special thanks to Natty23 - InspectorJ - Klankbeeld for sound effects and Kenney for art

Spoiler - Only Read If You Are Stuck

Day 1: Cut the grass --> Go to the main door

Day 2: Clean the house --> Go to the kitchen window --> Pick the knife --> break the door's lock using the knife

Known Bugs: Breaking Locks Sound effect doesn't play on the web version
